Package fr.umlv.clue

Class Clues

java.lang.Object
fr.umlv.clue.Clues
public class Clues
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
mohamed class for object clue of a player, extends AskClues defines Arraylist of Arraylist of clues

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Clues()
    constructs an object Cluee, cluelist is arraylist of two arayliste type of clues each contains cards that was given as clues

  • Method Details

    • addClue

      public void addClue​(java.util.List<Card> cards, ClueTypes clueType)
      method to add clue to the specific list of clues
      Parameters:
      cards - list of card clues to add
      clueType - enum type of clue to add card in (context of the clue for the card )

    • removeClue

      public void removeClue​(Card card)
      remove all the clues about a specific card from the clues list
      Parameters:
      card - card to remove from the list of clues

    • hasClueOnCard

      public boolean hasClueOnCard​(Card card, ClueTypes clueType)
      determens if cluesList has a specific clueType on card
      Parameters:
      card - card to check if we have clue for
      clueType - specific clue type to check
      Returns:
      boolean true if has a clue on card, else false

    • getColorClues

      public java.util.List<Card> getColorClues​(Hand playerHand, CardColor color)
      Asks the player helping the color of the cards to give clues about, only accepts valid entry and determines the specific cards to register as clues for the player to help uses streams to filler and collects clues
      Parameters:
      playerHand - the hand of the player to help
      color - to get
      Returns:
      list of cards concerned about the clue given

    • getNumberClues

      public java.util.List<Card> getNumberClues​(Hand playerHand, int number)
      Asks the player helping the value of the cards to give clues about, only accepts valid entry and determines the specific cards to register as clues for the player to help uses streams to filter and collect clues
      Parameters:
      playerHand - the hand of the player to help
      number - number to get
      Returns:
      list of cards concerned about the clue given
